on readFileContents(filePath)
    try
        set fileReference to open for access file filePath
        set fileContents to read fileReference as «class utf8»
        close access fileReference
        return fileContents
    on error errMsg number errNum
        if (errNum is equal to -49) then
            return "File not found."
        else if (errNum is equal to -43) then
            return "File path is incorrect."
        else
            return "Error: " & errMsg
        end if
    end try
end readFileContents

on appendTextToFile(filePath, textToAppend)
  set theFile to POSIX file filePath as alias
  try
    open for access theFile with write permission
    set eof of theFile to (get eof of theFile)
    write textToAppend to theFile starting at eof
    close access theFile
  on error errMsg
    close access theFile
    error errMsg
  end try
end appendTextToFile

        set eof of theFile to 0
        write theText to theFile starting at eof

        try

on writeToFile(filePath, content)
	tell application "System Events"
		set fileRef to open for access file filePath with write permission
		try
			set eof fileRef to 0
			write content to fileRef starting at eof
		on error errMsg
			display dialog "Error: " & errMsg
		end try
		close access fileRef
	end tell
end writeToFile

on readFile(pathToFile)
    try
        set fileRef to open for access pathToFile
        set fileContents to read fileRef as «class utf8»
        close access fileRef
        return fileContents
    on error errMsg number errNum
        if errNum is -49 then
            try
                close access pathToFile
            end try
            return "Error: The file was already open."
        else
            return "Error: " & errMsg
        end if
    end try
end readFile

		set fileAlias to POSIX file filePath as alias
	end tell
	set fileContents to ""
	try
		open for access fileAlias
		set fileContents to read fileAlias
		close access fileAlias
	on error errMsg number errNum
		try
			close access fileAlias
		end try
		error errMsg number errNum
	end try
	return fileContents
end readFileContents

on writeTextToFile(theText, theFilePath)
    try
        set theFile to POSIX file theFilePath as alias
        open for access theFile with write permission
        set eof of theFile to 0
        write theText to theFile starting at eof
        close access theFile
    on error errMsg number errNum
        try
            close access theFile
        end try
        error "Error writing to file: " & errMsg
    end try
end writeTextToFile
